How to report PARKS and RECREATION issues in Joburg

To make sure our city services work well, it's important to report issues like potholes, power cuts, water leaks, or fallen trees. Following up and taking more steps if needed can help fix these issues. Hereâ€™s how you can report these issues in Joburg.

Please read point 4 for reporting issues with PARKS and RECREATION.

Steps for reporting issues:

  1. **Go to the Joburg eservices website to log a fault: **
  • City of Joburg e-services
  1. Call the Joburg Call Centre:
  • Phone: 0860 56 28 74
  • Email: joburgconnect@joburg.org.za
  1. Register on Log Now Smart City:
  • Sign up at Log Now to report city problems and see FAQs.
  1. Report PARKS and RECREATION issues:
Category Sub-Category What You Can Report Department Contact
Parks and Recreation Fallen Trees and Dead Tree Removal Report fallen or dead trees in public areas. Johannesburg City Parks and Zoo (JCPZ) Phone number: 011 712-6600 Email addresses: vmkhize@jhbcityparks.com, vsikbeko@jhbcityparks.com, pkubheka@jhbcityparks.com
Parks and Recreation Grass Cutting Request grass cutting in public spaces. Johannesburg City Parks and Zoo (JCPZ) Phone number: 011 712-6600 Email address: joburgconnect@joburg.org.za
Parks and Recreation Sports Grounds Report maintenance issues for public sports grounds. Johannesburg City Parks and Zoo (JCPZ) Phone number: 011 712 6600 Email address: joburgconnect@joburg.org.za
Parks and Recreation Parks and Playgrounds Report issues with public parks and playgrounds. Johannesburg City Parks and Zoo (JCPZ) Phone number: 011 712 6600 Email address: joburgconnect@joburg.org.za
Parks and Recreation Communal Gyms Report damaged equipment or maintenance needs in communal gyms. Johannesburg City Parks and Zoo (JCPZ) Phone number: 011 712 6600 Email address: joburgconnect@joburg.org.za
Parks and Recreation Tree Trimming Request tree trimming in public areas. Johannesburg City Parks and Zoo (JCPZ) Phone number: 011 712 6600 Email address: joburgconnect@joburg.org.za
Parks and Recreation Parks Maintenance Report any maintenance issues in public parks. Johannesburg City Parks and Zoo (JCPZ) Phone number: 011 712 6600 Email address: joburgconnect@joburg.org.za
Parks and Recreation Broken Park Furniture Report broken or damaged park furniture. Johannesburg City Parks and Zoo (JCPZ) Phone number: 011 712 6600 Email address: joburgconnect@joburg.org.za
Parks and Recreation Public Sports Field Maintenance Report maintenance needs for public sports fields. Johannesburg City Parks and Zoo (JCPZ) Phone number: 011 712 6600 Email address: joburgconnect@joburg.org.za
Parks and Recreation Road Medians Gardens/Landscape Maintenance Report maintenance needs for gardens or landscaping on road medians. Johannesburg City Parks and Zoo (JCPZ) Phone number: 011 712 6600 Email address: joburgconnect@joburg.org.za
Parks and Recreation Tree Planting Request tree planting initiatives in public spaces. Johannesburg City Parks and Zoo (JCPZ) Phone number: 011 712 6600 Email address: joburgconnect@joburg.org.za
Parks and Recreation Public Toilet Out of Order Report public toilets that are out of order. Johannesburg City Parks and Zoo (JCPZ) Phone number: 011 712 6600 Email address: joburgconnect@joburg.org.za
Parks and Recreation Vandalised or Damaged Park Fence Report vandalism or damage to park fences. Johannesburg City Parks and Zoo (JCPZ) Phone number: 011 712 6600 Email address: joburgconnect@joburg.org.za
Parks and Recreation Graveyards or Cemeteries Maintenance Report maintenance needs for graveyards or cemeteries. Johannesburg City Parks and Zoo (JCPZ) Phone number: 011 712 6600 Email address: joburgconnect@joburg.org.za
Parks and Recreation Recreation Centres Maintenance Report maintenance issues at public recreation centres. Johannesburg City Parks and Zoo (JCPZ) Phone number: 011 712 6600 Email address: joburgconnect@joburg.org.za
Parks and Recreation Garden Sites Management Report issues related to the management of public garden sites. Johannesburg City Parks and Zoo (JCPZ) Phone number: 011 712 6600 Email address: joburgconnect@joburg.org.za

Source: City of Joburg - https://joburg.org.za/services
